channel.title: Object ID through client
channel.description:
I'm having a little bit of trouble through adding object ID's on specific players name.
So far I've added it server-sided, to recognize the player 3 rights and allow them to read the client from Objectlist.
Basically I need to just hover over an object, or right click it and it will show me the object ID.

item.title: Object ID through client
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

You could always use the MoparScape client for development if you want only the admins to see the IDs.

Read full topic

item.title: Object ID through client
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

I’m having a little bit of trouble through adding object ID’s on specific players name.

So far I’ve added it server-sided, to recognize the player 3 rights and allow them to read the client from Objectlist.

Basically I need to just hover over an object, or right click it and it will show me the object ID.

Read full topic
